item.title: Must Contextual Description Be Bound To Records Description?
item.description: I've been struggling with the fact that (American) archival practice seems to bind contextual description (i.e., description of records creators) to records description. Much of these thoughts have been stirring in my head as a result of my class at Rare Book School.
